channel.title: Splunk APM on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in Splunk APM on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: 1. APM Service Map
item.description: Arrived in APM from a RUM trace Validate workflow is frontend:/cart/checkout. Talk to the service map and how it is auto-generated

item.title: 2. APM Overview
item.description: Click on Overview Validate environment is the correct workshop one Ensure APM Overview is visible What can you conclude from the top services by error rate chart? Explain inferred services

item.title: 3. APM Explore
item.description: Click Explore, and explain that compared to earlier you now see all services (including inferred) Hover over the paymentservice, what can you conclude from popup service chart? Is there a pattern to this error rate? We have a handy tool for that, tag spotlight.

item.title: 4. APM Tag Spotlight
item.description: Click on the paymentservice Click on Tag Spotlight Ensure Show tags with no values is off. What can you conclude from the data you are seeing? Which chart helped you come to this conclusion? (Answer is version). Return to APM Explorer.

item.title: 5. APM Service Breakdown
item.description: Click on the payment service and then from breakdown select version You can see all errors are due to v350.10

item.title: 6. APM Trace Analyzer
item.description: Click on traces and sort the traces by duration descending by longest duration Select the 1st trace ensuring it has a long duration

item.title: 7. APM Waterfall
item.description: What can you conclude is going on from the waterfall? (Answer multiple attempts) Verify version is v350.10 by looking at the metadata under tags. Conclusion … we have a problem. Draw attention to related content … TBC Click on Logs for trace XXXXXXX
